description: Detects when the registration of a VSS/VDS Provider as a COM+ application.
name: Suspicious Registration via cscript.exe
query: (process.executable:*\\cscript.exe AND process.command_line:*\-register* AND process.command_line:(*\\Windows\ Kits\\10\\bin\\10.0.22000.0\\x64* OR *\\Windows\ Kits\\10\\bin\\10.0.19041.0\\x64* OR *\\Windows\ Kits\\10\\bin\\10.0.17763.0\\x64*))
author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
